name: Manic Archers
description:
Manic Archers - the Most Simple Game Of All Time.


MANIC ARCHERS is an atmospheric and extremely addictive local multiplayer arcade game in 8bit-/Pixel Art-style.
It features simplistic and on-the-point gameplay with amazing game mechanics and lovely pixel art-details.
It is playable with up to four players simultaneously on one device.

The players each control archers shooting the opposing archers until one team is eliminated.
During the game a lot of game changing powerups and special arrows appear on the playing field enabling players to turn the game around.
There are several multiplayer game modes such as:
  • Versus
  • Coop
  • King of the hill
  • Catch the fool with the chicken

As Well As A Single Player Mode.

The game takes place on a single screen with wrap-around scrolling. Player can use several elements of the top-down environment strategically such as water, higher grounds, obstacles and more.

Planned

  • More lovely details
  • Better singleplayer performance measurement
  • More singleplayer / coop gameplay
  • Sudden Death
  • More smart powerups and arrows
